name: Horror Model Showcase
description:
This showcases 3D models and lighting settings made on Unity3D, altogether creating an Lovecraftian horror game atmosphere.

All 3D models used in the project were made on 3DS Max and imported to Unity3D in FBX format, apart from the water asset from Unity Standard Assets.

  • Variations of houses
  • Trash bin
  • Chains and post
  • Barrels
  • Crates
  • Mountains/rocks
  • Lighthouse

The movement controller wobbles to simulate the nauseating feeling of the ocean travels.
